sentences.chinese: 今天校長講話的主要目的是訓勉後學。

sentences.english: Luo Roufang is the major representative of Taizhou school of Neo confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 羅汝芳是陽明後學泰州派的重要代表。

sentences.english: Then the focus of YangMing-school transfer to effort on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 陽明後學的爭論焦點轉移到了工夫論問題上。
